# notacompany.com

**Website:** https://notacompany.com  
**Portfolio:** https://notacompany.com/portfolio  
**Contact:** hey@notacompany.com  
**Source:** https://github.com/not-a-company/notacompany

## About

Still building stuff for Humans.

I'm **Tiago Martins**, founder and solo employee of *not a company*. I'm an engineer who believes technology should amplify human potential, not replace human judgment. Over the years, I've been involved with 16 consumer infrastructure brandsâ€”building some from scratch, investing in others, and advising many more.

This isn't a venture studio or an agency. It's just me, building and supporting things that help people live better (hopefully).

## Portfolio (16 brands)

### Active Creations
- **Steps.org** (2025) - Safe AI Behavioural Addiction Recovery Tutorials
- **Superstables** (2025) - Institutional-scale stablecoin to fiat conversion

### Advisory & Investment
- **Acreditar** (2024) - Portugal's largest children's cancer support foundation
- **SoSquared** (2023) - Influencer marketing infrastructure
- **Talent Protocol** (2021) - Decentralized professional reputation infrastructure
- **CoFlyt** (2019) - Private aviation charter platform
- **Fisacar** (2017) - Automotive services infrastructure

### Successful Exits
- **xMoney** (2022) - Stablecoin payments infrastructure
- **Polkastarter** (2020) - Decentralized fundraising platform
- **Bet Protocol** (2019) - Decentralized task marketplace
- **Nexo** (2018) - Cryptocurrency wealth management ($11B+ AUM)
- **Coinvision** (2018) - Cryptocurrency investment analysis
- **Codeplace** (2013) - Programming education (100k+ students)

### No Longer Active
- **Mahalo** (2023) - Non-profit fundraising platform
- **impactMarket** (2020) - Universal Basic Income platform
- **Songvice** (2011) - Music producer advisory
